page.title: 15The Future Development
page.content: There must be some doubt as to the future of Whitwell with the scheduled closure within ten years of the mine. The Quarry will continue to provide some{local employment,}as will the farms. The several local building firms are also busy, and this possibly gives a clue as to the future of the village. Already in Whitwell there has been a great deal of recent housing development. The houses that have been built, particularly on Hunter's Park, are family size houses, and many have been bought by{commuters.}Increasingly it seems that Whitwell is being seen as within reasonable travelling distance of Worksop and Sheffield. An equivalent three bedroomed house in Whitwell would be some ten thousand pounds cheaper than in{Sheffield. It is very likely that the nature of the villages in the grid will change.
